title: migrate SuppressWarningsHolder to use property macro
description:
there is problem to migrate SuppressWarningsHolder to property macro for aliasList for public void setAliasList(String... aliasList) {

migration:

- diff --git a/src/xdocs/checks/annotation/suppresswarningsholder.xml.template b/src/xdocs/checks/annotation/suppresswarningsholder.xml.template index 8abced6..532bafa 100644 --- a/src/xdocs/checks/annotation/suppresswarningsholder.xml.template +++ b/src/xdocs/checks/annotation/suppresswarningsholder.xml.template @@ -26,29 +26,10 @@
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
namedescriptiontypedefault valuesince
aliasList - Specify aliases for check names that can be used in code within - SuppressWarnings. - - String[] - in a format of comma separated attribute=value entries. - The attribute is the fully qualified name of the Check and value is its alias. - null5.7
+ + +
">
